alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 6:33PM CST until December 18 at 12:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow showers expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Vilas County. * WHEN...Until noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered and slippery road conditions, along with reduced visibilities. Minor blowing and drifting snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
